alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 10:31PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN TODD...NORTHWESTERN TRIPP AND SOUTHEASTERN MELLETTE COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1130 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles north of Mosher to 5 miles southwest of Hidden Timber. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Okreek, Mosher, and Hidden Timber around 1135 PM CDT. Carter around 1140 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
